title: just got 2 free summoner icons (piltover  + tsm) why?
body:
Hi

i got 2 icons
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/5f/ProfileIcon1448.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161126031934
and
a 2012 or 2013 tsm icon.

why did i get those?

replies.body: I just got 3 notifications for receiving 3 icons, poro king, TSM logo and I think it was a star guardian. Fairly sure I already own these too.

These are old icons that you already received.  The updated client just enabled the toast notifications for testing, so per the current [ticker ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-)you're seeing backlog of old notifications.  Let me know if that clears things up!
toast notifications? how do you guys know when my toast is ready? now im terrified
